src_original: anyathā padavṛndam idaṃ na padam /  yad vā vyutpādyata ity atreti draṣṭavyam /  nanūktam -- `prayojanaṃ puruṣārthasiddhiḥ' /
tat kiṃ punaś cintyate /  kathaṃ ca tad anyatocyata ity āha -- prayojanaṃ cātra iti /  co vaktavyāntarasamuccye /

tad ayam arthaḥ -- noktaṃ prayojanam iti cintyate kiṃ tu guṇabhūtārthaprayojakapadasya vyutpādyata ity asya prayojanam /  tadvyutpattiḥ kriyata iti ṇicaḥ kiṃ prayojanam iti praśne tasya prayojanaṃ cintyata iti yāvat /  atreti guṇabhūtārthnirūpaṇe prakaraṇakaraṇam eva vyāpāraḥ /  nanu kasmād iyam āśaṅkā -- `vaktrā kimarthaṃ krityate,  śrotṛbhiś ca kimarthaṃ śrūyata' iti /

tau khalv evam eva pravartteyātām ity āśaṅkyāha -- tathā hīti yasmāt /  atha katham ubhayor vyutpādanaṃ prayojanam ucyatge?  yady ato vyutpadyate tasya vyutpattiḥ prayojanam /  yas tu vyutpādayati tasya vyutpādanam iti /  naitad asti /
